nodes.bodyText: all of these could be final

!checkUpgradeMatrix is not part of the permit logic hence I would extract it to the containing method:
permitByComponentVersion(currentVersion, newVersion) && (!checkUpgradeMatrix || permitByUpgradeMatrix(currentVersion, newVersion, checkUpgradeMatrix) );
Could you pls add a test covering checkUpgradeMatrix=false here?
